name: Affiliates Manager Simple Membership Integration
author: wp.insider, affmngr

sections.description:
This addon allows you to integrate Simple Membership plugin with the Affiliates Manager plugin.

When a user pay for membership on your site, this addon will check to see if the user was referred to your site by an affiliate. It will then give commission to the affiliate who referred the user.

This addon requires the Affiliates Manager Plugin and Simple Membership Plugin.

Read the usage documentation here
sections.installation:
1. Upload affiliatemgr-simple-membership-integration folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  • Added support for subscription payments.

1.0.3

  • Added support for customer email address.

1.0.2

  • Added payment tracking for Stripe and Braintree gateways.

1.0.1

  • First commit to wordpress.org

short_description: Process an affiliate commission via Affiliates Manager after a Simple Membership payment
